  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 25

Words 2401-2500

  1. similar
    The two houses are very similar in size and design.

  2. similarity
    There is a strong similarity between the two paintings.

  3. similarly
    She loves reading; similarly, her brother enjoys books.

  4. simple
    The instructions were so simple that anyone could follow them.

  5. simply
    He simply refused to listen to her explanation.

  6. since
    I have been working here since last year.

  7. sincere
    She gave a sincere apology for her mistake.

  8. sing
    He loves to sing in the shower every morning.

  9. singer
    The singer performed beautifully at the concert.

  10. singing
    Singing is her favorite hobby.

  11. single
    He didn’t make a single mistake on the test.

  12. sink
    The boat began to sink after hitting the rock.

  13. sir
    Excuse me, sir, can you help me find this address?

  14. sister
    My sister and I often go shopping together.

  15. sit
    Please sit down and make yourself comfortable.

  16. site
    This site is perfect for building a new house.

  17. situation
    The situation became worse after the heavy rain.

  18. six
    There are six apples in the basket.

  19. sixteen
    She will turn sixteen next month.

  20. sixty
    The speed limit on this road is sixty miles per hour.

  21. size
    What size shoes do you wear?

  22. ski
    They plan to ski in the mountains this winter.

  23. skiing
    Skiing is a popular winter sport in this region.

  24. skill
    Cooking is a skill that takes time to master.

  25. skin
    Her skin feels soft and smooth.

  26. skirt
    She bought a new skirt for the party.

  27. sky
    The sky is clear and blue today.

  28. slave
    History books often discuss the life of a slave.

  29. sleep
    I need to sleep early tonight.

  30. slice
    Can I have a slice of bread, please?

  31. slide
    The children love to slide down the hill.

  32. slight
    There was a slight change in the schedule.

  33. slightly
    The room is slightly warmer than before.

  34. slip
    Be careful not to slip on the wet floor.

  35. slope
    The slope of the hill is very steep.

  36. slow
    The traffic was slow due to the construction work.

  37. slowly
    He walked slowly to enjoy the view.

  38. small
    She lives in a small house near the park.

  39. smart
    He is a smart student who always gets good grades.

  40. smartphone
    She uses her smartphone to check emails.

  41. smell
    The smell of fresh bread filled the kitchen.

  42. smile
    She greeted him with a warm smile.

  43. smoke
    Smoke was coming out of the chimney.

  44. smoking
    Smoking is not allowed in this building.

  45. smooth
    The surface of the table is very smooth.

  46. snake
    We saw a snake in the garden yesterday.

  47. snow
    The snow covered the ground like a white blanket.

  48. so
    She was tired, so she went to bed early.

  49. soap
    Wash your hands with soap and water.

  50. soccer
    Soccer is a popular sport around the world.

  51. social
    She enjoys attending social events with her friends.

  52. society
    Education plays an important role in society.

  53. sock
    He lost one sock while doing the laundry.

  54. soft
    The pillow is soft and comfortable.

  55. software
    This software helps you edit photos easily.

  56. soil
    The soil in this area is good for farming.

  57. solar
    They installed solar panels on the roof.

  58. soldier
    The soldier returned home after the war.

  59. solid
    The ice was solid enough to walk on.

  60. solution
    We need to find a solution to this problem.

  61. solve
    Can you solve this math problem?

  62. some
    I need some help with my homework.

  63. somebody
    Somebody left their bag on the bus.

  64. someone
    Someone is knocking at the door.

  65. something
    I have something important to tell you.

  66. sometimes
    Sometimes I like to take a walk in the evening.

  67. somewhat
    The movie was somewhat interesting but not great.

  68. somewhere
    I left my keys somewhere in the house.

  69. son
    His son is studying at the university.

  70. song
    This song always makes me feel happy.

  71. soon
    I hope to see you again soon.

  72. sorry
    I’m sorry for being late to the meeting.

  73. sort
    What sort of music do you like?

  74. soul
    Music is food for the soul.

  75. sound
    The sound of the waves is very relaxing.

  76. soup
    She made a delicious chicken soup for dinner.

  77. source
    The river is the main source of water for the village.

  78. south
    They traveled to the south of the country for vacation.

  79. southern
    The southern part of the city is very quiet.

  80. space
    There is enough space in the car for everyone.

  81. speak
    Can you speak a little louder, please?

  82. speaker
    The speaker gave an inspiring talk at the event.

  83. special
    This is a special gift for your birthday.

  84. specialist
    He is a specialist in computer programming.

  85. species
    This species of bird is found only in this region.

  86. specific
    Can you give me a specific example?

  87. specifically
    I bought this book specifically for my research.

  88. speech
    His speech was both informative and entertaining.

  89. speed
    The car was moving at a high speed.

  90. spell
    Can you spell your name for me?

  91. spelling
    Her spelling has improved a lot this year.

  92. spend
    I like to spend my weekends reading books.

  93. spending
    Spending time with family is very important.

  94. spicy
    The food was too spicy for me to eat.

  95. spider
    There was a spider on the wall.

  96. spirit
    The team played with great spirit and determination.

  97. spiritual
    Meditation is a spiritual practice for many people.

  98. split
    Let’s split the bill equally among us.

  99. spoken
    English is widely spoken around the world.

  100. sponsor
    The company agreed to sponsor the event.
